path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Iosiro/Synthetix Schedar Release Smart Contract Audit _ iosiro.md

findings.title: Potentially incorrect number of iterations in `for` loop
findings.description: The `feesBurned()` and `totalFeesBurned()` functions used `for` loops that iterated from `1` to `FEE_PERIOD_LENGTH`, which in effect only performed one iteration of the loop with a value `1`. Referencing period `1` returned correct values for the most recently closed period; however, if the value of `FEE_PERIOD_LENGTH` were to be changed, the functions would return incorrect values, multiple periods would be used in the calculation.
